Taylor 190 Taylor Chapel

Devotional

8/27/2013

Taylor 190 Taylor Chapel

2:10 PM to 3:00 PM - Taylor 190 Taylor Chapel: Kent Davis Biology Faculty, BYU-Idaho

Webcast with President Kim B. Clark

8/29/2013

BYU-Idaho Center Auditorium

7:00 PM to 8:00 PM - BYU-Idaho Center Auditorium: In his webcast, 'A Faithful and Wise Steward: Preparing for a Successful BYU-Idaho Experience,' President Kim B. Clark will be sharing information about new BYU-Idaho students, Alumni and Pathway. Keep up-to-date with what is happening and the vision of BYU-Idaho.

Devotional

9/3/2013

Taylor 190 Taylor Chapel

2:10 PM to 3:00 PM - Taylor 190 Taylor Chapel: Kari Archibald Health, Recreation, and Human Performance Faculty, BYU-Idaho

CES Devotional

9/8/2013

BYU-Idaho Center Auditorium

6:00 PM to 7:00 PM - BYU-Idaho Center Auditorium: Elder Russell M. Nelson of the Quorum of the Twelve Apostles will speak at a CES Devotional for young adults ages 18 through 30, both married and single. Visit CES Devotionals for more information.

Fall Employee Banquet

9/10/2013

Manwaring Center 220 Grand Ballroom

5:30 PM to 7:00 PM - Manwaring Center 220 Grand Ballroom

Faculty Conference

Hinckley 240 Hinckley Chapel

Employees Monthly Q&A with President's Executive Group
